group_1.textLeft: We got to the station late.

group_1.textRight: …'Cause I was taking so long…

group_1.textLeft: It's not your fault, Hanna!@It's all because I lost…

group_1.textRight: Lost what…?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, no, it's nothing. I meant…
Theeere we go! Lookie! Money!

group_1.textRight: …Sena.

group_1.textLeft: No, I'm not a thief.@I had this in my treasure box.

group_1.textRight: The one hidden under the water tank?

group_1.textLeft: Right. I put my important things there so@that man wouldn't steal them…
This crumpled 1,000 yen bill is the ticket@to happiness…

group_1.textRight: …You're gonna take the train with that?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. I need to conserve my magic.

group_1.textRight: Ah, gotcha…@Uwasa are always eatin' up magic.

group_1.textLeft: And once our magic runs out, that's the end@of the line…
That's why we need to reserve it as much@as we can.

group_1.textRight: …You really okay with this, Sena?@We can still turn back.

group_1.textLeft: I don't know what will happen to you if@we return.
I can't take you back to that place.

group_1.textRight: Sorry for causing you all this trouble.

group_1.textLeft: You've done no such thing!

group_1.textRight: Sena…

group_1.textLeft: Alright, okay, let's see how far 1,000 yen will@take us!

group_1.textRight: Ah…

group_1.narration: It's fine. Hanna still doesn't know…@If I don't keep this well-hidden,@she'll turn back the moment she discovers@she's a [textBlue:Rumor] that gathers malice.
Even if she returned to Iroha and the others,@Hanna would almost certainly try erasing it@for a reason she can't admit…especially@in her current condition.
…I won't let that happen.@I'll protect her no matter what it costs.

group_1.textCenter: Ah…it looks like people can't travel far on this…
Well, still, I'll buy it anyway… Because if we@don't get out of here soon, someone will—

group_1.textRight: …Sena?

group_1.textCenter: I knew it was you, Mikoto Sena.

group_1.textLeft: …Ahh…Kanagi Izumi.@What are you doing here?

group_1.textRight: I'm in a bit of panic, if you haven't realized.
I received a message that Tamaki and Hiiragi@have gone missing… How else do I react…?

group_1.textLeft: (...Touka must have realized something was up.@It took longer than I expected…)

group_1.textRight: …What's your plan, Sena?@If you tell me the truth…

group_1.textLeft: Just curious, do you think it's right to bring@the dead back to life?

group_1.textRight: Huh? …That's a difficult question…@[chara:101602:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101602:lipSynch_1][chara:101602:cheek_0][chara:101602:face_mtn_ex_000.exp3.json]No, I don't think it's a good idea.

group_1.textLeft: Then I don't need you.

group_1.textRight: You don't need me?@What does that mean…?

group_1.textCenter: It means you're a pain in the ass.

group_1.textRight: Hm?!

group_1.textLeft: H-Hanna…Sarasa… You…?

group_1.textRight: Don't forget about us.

group_1.textLeft: Shoot—!

group_1.textRight: Get moving, Sena!

group_1.textLeft: H-Hanna! Here's your ticket!@You can't ride without paying!

group_1.textRight: Okay, I get it, dammit!

group_1.narration: In a mad rush, we handed over our tickets@and passed through the ticket gate.
We're going somewhere, to some place that's@not here, somewhere with just the two of us.

group_1.textCenter: Please refrain from rushing before the doors@close.

group_1.textLeft: Hanna, the train is coming!@C'mon, hurry!

group_1.textRight: Sena, your shoe fell off on the stairs!

group_1.textLeft: Eh? Like Cinderella…
In that case, you drop your shoes too Hanna!@I'll pick them up!

group_1.textRight: What?! We don't have time for that crap!@Hurry, get 'em back on!

group_1.narration: I'm so anxious. If I run off like this,@my magic will run out sooner rather than later,@and I don't know how long my memories will last.
We're always at a dead end.
And yet…@How is it that the present seems so bright?@Why am I so happy?
If Hanna felt the same way…that alone would@be enough for me to endure any pain.

group_1.textRight: Phew. Barely made it.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah…
…Hey, Hanna.

group_1.textRight: Yeah?

group_1.textLeft: The sunset is so beautiful.

group_1.textRight: I'm happy…that I can escape from this world@with you, Sena.

group_1.textLeft: Eh…?

group_1.textRight: …I know you're worried about the future.
Since you took me with you, you ended up@going on the run…
But I…@[chara:301801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:301801:lipSynch_1][chara:301801:cheek_0][chara:301801:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json]Ahh, no, I'm so happy to be saying this…
I'm so happy to be with you.

group_1.textLeft: Hanna…

group_1.textRight: …Say, you told me some stories of the past@while we were on our little tour, yeah?

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Yeah…

group_1.textRight: All that made me realize just how much I@needed you…
It's crystal clear now.
…So I'm on your side, and your side alone.
There's no way I can join the side of justice@at this point.

group_1.textLeft: Hanna… Can you…hold my hand?@I wasn't even able to touch you before…

group_1.textRight: Erm… Uh, yeah.

group_1.textLeft: You have beautiful hands.

group_1.textRight: My hands got dirty the moment I made@my wish.

group_1.textLeft: Even if the entire world thinks that,@they look beautiful to me.
Your hands are clean to me alone.
…I'm glad.

group_1.narration: The clickety-clack noise of the train and@the scenery rolling by fills me with so@much nostalgia that it makes me feel silly.
I'm leaving here with my beloved Hanna…

group_1.textRight: Is this where we're supposed to meet with@Meiyui and the others?

group_1.textLeft: Yes… We've received information that Iroha@is missing.
Thus, we must swiftly gather our forces and@search for clues.

group_1.textRight: I see… [chara:301101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:301101:lipSynch_1][chara:301101:motion_100]Huh?@Look who's over there…

group_1.textLeft: Kanagi?
